name: Chef Gordono's Kitchen
description:
Help Chef Gordono keep up with his seemingly endless influx of customers!

Grab a tray, collect the items necessary to complete the order, then return the tray to the counter.

Be careful! What happens when Gordono gets overwhelmed with orders? You don't want to know...

Controller (recommended):

Left stick - move Gordono

A - interact

L/R - cycle through orders

Keyboard:

Arrows/WASD - move Gordono

Enter/space - interact

Q/R - cycle through orders

ESC - quit
